participant_1.name: Jessica
participant_1.personality: Supportive, empathetic, and optimistic. She enjoys connecting with others and helping them find their way.
participant_1.background: I like to shoot a bow. My favorite holiday is Halloween. I like to remodel homes. I like to go hunting. I like to go shopping with my daughters.

participant_2.name: Ethan
participant_2.personality: Reflective, introspective, and a bit self-critical. He often struggles with his self-image and seeks growth.
participant_2.background: I want to move. I don’t like feeling controlled. I wish I could take back a mistake. I don’t like my reputation. I have a harsh inner critic.

content.text: Not much, just feeling a bit down.
I just feel like I'm not good enough.
I don't know. I just feel like I'm not living up to my own expectations.
Well, you're not perfect. But that doesn't mean you're not good enough. Everyone has their own strengths and weaknesses.
I know, but I still feel like I'm not doing enough.
Well, what would you like to do?
I don't know. I just feel like I'm not living up to my potential.
Well, you're the only one who can decide what your potential is. But if you want to make a change, you have to take the first step.
I know. I just don't know where to start.
Well, what are you passionate about?
I love to go hunting and remodel homes.
Okay, so what if you started by taking a class on how to remodel homes? Or you could start by looking for a new job in the construction industry.
That's a great idea! I'll look into it.
Good! And if you ever need someone to talk to, I'm always here.
